choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for this week.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews
Certainly! Here is a sample meal plan for you for the week:
Monday:
- Breakfast - Oatmeal with banana and peanut butter
- Lunch - Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cucumber, and avocado
- Dinner - Baked salmon with roasted vegetables (sweet potato, broccoli, and carrots)
Tuesday:
- Breakfast - Scrambled eggs with spinach and whole wheat toast
- Lunch - Quinoa bowl with roasted beets, chickpeas, and kale
- Dinner - Grilled shrimp with grilled vegetables (zucchini, bell pepper, and onion)
Wednesday:
- Breakfast - Greek yogurt with mixed berries and almonds
- Lunch - Turkey wrap with whole wheat tortilla, avocado, and cucumber
- Dinner - Stir fry with tofu, broccoli, carrots, and bell pepper
Thursday:
- Breakfast - Smoothie with banana, spinach, almond milk, and honey
- Lunch - Vegetable soup with whole wheat bread
- Dinner - Baked chicken breast with roasted vegetables (brussels sprouts, cauliflower, and green beans)
Friday:
- Breakfast - Whole wheat pancakes with sliced banana and almond butter
- Lunch - Tuna salad with mixed greens and whole wheat crackers
- Dinner - Grilled shrimp with quinoa and roasted vegetables (asparagus, cherry tomatoes, and red pepper)
Saturday:
- Breakfast - Omelette with spinach, mushrooms, and feta cheese
- Lunch - Vegetable stir fry with tofu and brown rice
- Dinner - Grilled steak with roasted vegetables (zucchini, bell pepper, and onion)
Sunday:
- Breakfast - Whole wheat waffles with sliced banana and almond butter
- Lunch - Turkey sandwich with whole wheat bread, avocado, and cucumber
- Dinner - Baked salmon with roasted vegetables (sweet potato, broccoli, and carrots)
